page.title: 12A Child's Day
page.content: I arise at 0815 and dress. After dressing I go downstairs for breakfast. Weetabix or cornflakes sprinkled with sugar and hot milk followed by toast and orange. Mum takes me to school at 0830. I play for 30 minutes before school starts at 0900. In the mornings we do a variety of subjects including computer use. After the first break we have assembly and lunch. Lunch consists of meatballs, mashed potato and yogurt for example. During the next break we play horses with a partner. School ends at 1530 after which I return home for a snack. At 1700 Dad arrives and we have Tea. I then practice on my Guitar and watch some TV before going to bed at 2030.
